fkeys: SELECT fkc.parent_column_id AS ColumnNumber, OBJECT_NAME(fkc.referenced_object_id) AS TableName FROM sys.foreign_key_columns AS fkc WHERE OBJECT_NAME(fkc.parent_object_id) =
insert: INSERT INTO Products(Name,UnitId) VALUES (@Name,@UnitId) SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY();
update: UPDATE Products SET Name=@Name,UnitId=@UnitId WHERE Id = @Id;
